S04n422:1: iti hi bhikṣavo yāmeva rātriṃ bodhisattvo jātastasyāmeva rātryāṃ viṃśati kanyāsahasrāṇi kṣatriyabrāhmaṇanaigamagṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu jātāḥ |
S04n422:3: viṃśati ca kanyāsahasrāṇi rājñā śuddhodanena dattāni bodhisattvasyopasthānaparicaryāyai |
S04n422:6: tadā ca bhikṣavo mahallakamahallikāḥ śākyāḥ saṃnipatya rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ-yatkhalu deva jānīyāḥ-devakulaṃ kumāra upanīyatāmiti |
S04n422:23: iti hi bhikṣavo yathoktapūrvaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtamabhūt ||
S04n422:24: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ svagṛhaṃ praviśya mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantryaivamāha-alaṃkriyantāṃ kumāraḥ devakulamupaneṣyata iti |
S04n422:25: sādhviti pratiśrutya mahāprajāpatī gautamī kumāraṃ maṇḍayati sma ||
S04n422:26: tataḥ kumāro maṇḍyamānaḥ prahasitavadano vyapagatabhṛkuṭikaḥ paramamadhurayā vācā mātṛsvasāramevamāha-amba kutrāhamupaneṣyata iti |
S04n422:28: tataḥ kumāraḥ smitamupadarśayan prahasitavadano mātṛsvasāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata—
S04n422:33: katamo'nyu deva mama uttari yo viśiṣṭo
S04n422:36: devo na me'sti sadṛśaḥ kuta uttaraṃ vā ||2 ||
S04n422:41: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ sarvairvarṇaiḥ stutimaṅgalaiḥ pratyupasthitairaparimitālaṃkārālaṃkṛteṣu vīthicatvaraśṛṅgāṭakāntarāpaṇamukheṣvantaḥpure kumārasya rathamalaṃkṛtya rājā śuddhodano brāhmaṇanaigamaśreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājadauvārikapāriṣadyamitrajñātiparivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dhūpanadhūpitena muktapuṣpābhikīrṇena hayagajarathapattikalilenocchritachatradhvajapatākena nānātūryasaṃpravāditena mārgeṇa kumāraṃ gṛhītvā gacchati sma |
S04n422:43: anekāni ca devaputrāpsaraḥkoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi gaganatalagatāni puṣpavarṣāṇyabhipravarṣanti sma |
S04n422:45: iti hi rājā śuddhodano mahatā rājavyūhena mahatā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena kumāraṃ gṛhītvā devakulaṃ praviśati sma |
S04n422:46: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca bodhisattvena dakṣiṇaścaraṇayoḥ kramatalastasmin devakule atha tā acetanyo devapratimāḥ tadyathā-śivaskandanārāyaṇakuberacandrasūryavaiśravaṇaśakrabrahmalokapālaprabhṛtayaḥ pratimāḥ-sarvāḥ svebhyaḥ svebhyaḥ sthānebhyo vyutthāya bodhisattvasya kramatalayornipatanti sma |
S04n422:54: no merū girirāja parvatavaro jātū name sarṣape
S04n422:55: no vā sāgara nāgarājanilayo jātū name goṣpade |
S04n422:56: candrāditya prabhaṃkarā prabhakarā khadyotake no name
S04n422:58: yadvat sarṣapa goṣpade va salilaṃ khadyotakā vā bhavet
S04n422:59: evaṃ ca trisahasra devamanujā ye keci mānāśritāḥ |
S04n422:61: yaṃ loko hyabhivandya lābha labhate svargaṃ tathā nirvṛtim ||5 ||
S04n422:62: asmin khalu punarbhikṣavo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena devakule praveśe saṃdarśyamāne dvātriṃśatāṃ devaputraśatasahasrāṇāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpadyante |
S04n422:63: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yenopekṣako bodhisattvo bhavati sma devakulamupanīyamāna iti ||
